Question: Notorious starred this person regulars Ingrid Bergman and Cary Grant, and features a plot about Nazis, uranium, and South America.
Hints: This person also wrote a mystery story for Look magazine in 1943, "The Murder of Monty Woolley".
The ranch became the primary residence of the ____s for the rest of their lives, although they kept their Bel Air home.
This person directed more than fifty feature films in a career spanning six decades.
